title: Arctic Weather Satellite: advancing weather forecasting in a changing climate
summary: The effects of the climate crisis are felt more acutely in the Arctic than anywhere else on the planet. The weather in the Arctic is not only severe, but it changes extremely quickly. More frequent data are urgently needed to improve weather forecasts for this susceptible polar region.

title: AST SpaceMobile starts work on 17 larger direct-to-smartphone satellites
summary: AST SpaceMobile has started producing parts for 17 larger direct-to-smartphone satellites after taking advantage of its soaring stock price to raise more capital for the broadband constellation.

title: Geospatial AI Foundation Model Team Receives NASA Marshall Group Achievement Award
summary: NASA’s science efforts aim to empower scientists with the tools to perform research into our planet and universe. To this end, a collaborative effort between NASA and IBM created an AI geospatial foundation model, which was released as an open-source application in 2024.  Trained on vast amounts of NASA Earth science data, the foundation model […]

title: Russian nukes in space: Why a Cold War response will only make it worse
summary: Policymakers in Washington must not  fall prey to the notion that in response to Russia’s threat we ought to “nuke proof” every electronic system on orbit.

title: São Francisco’s Colorful Palette
summary: This Dec. 27, 2023 image of the São Francisco River in southeast Brazil showcases the range of vibrant colors in the area including blues, reds, greens, and yellows. Much of the unvegetated land, such as unplanted fields and unpaved roads, appears in bright shades of red and yellow. This coloration comes from the underlying clays […]
